mapper.select: SELECT pbi.project_level, COUNT(DISTINCT pbi.project_id, pu.user_id) AS count FROM project_base_info pbi INNER JOIN project_user pu ON pbi.project_id = pu.project_id WHERE pu.user_id = #{userId} AND pu.project_user_role <> 6 GROUP BY pbi.project_level

SELECT pbi.project_level, COUNT(DISTINCT pbi.project_id, pu.user_id) AS count FROM project_base_info pbi INNER JOIN project_user pu ON pbi.project_id = pu.project_id WHERE CURDATE() >= pbi.project_establish_time AND CURDATE() <= pbi.project_scheduled_completion_time AND pu.project_user_role <> 6 AND pu.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY pbi.project_level
